description:
After his battle with the enemy fleet, Wooser is hired as a tactical advisor.  He agrees, and is taken to a magical kingdom made of candy.  But this splendid, delicious land conceals a dark secret.  Where did all the people go?  ... we`ll probably never find out!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kingdom: Memories Faded, Memories Unfading, The Cutest Wooser in the World
Königreich ~Vergessenes, Unvergessliches, Der niedlichste Wooser der Welt~
王国 ~色あせた記録, 色褪せぬ記憶, 世界一かわいいうーさー~
